section.title: 编译安装
section.screen:
wget http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.x.x/Python-2.x.x.tgz tar zxvf Python-2.x.x.tgz cd Python-2.x.x ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/python2.x make make install
ln -s /usr/local/python/bin/python2.5 /usr/bin/ ln -s /usr/local/python/bin/* /usr/local/bin/
